meanings.definition: A common weed with small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: I pulled out the groundsel growing in my garden.
meanings.sent2: The groundsel spread quickly across the field.
meanings.sent3: The groundsel seemed to be playing hide and seek among the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The field was dotted with groundsel like specks of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow groundsel added a pop of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Senecio.
meanings.sent1: The groundsel in the garden attracted butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The groundsel plant had delicate leaves.
meanings.sent3: The groundsel plant waved in the breeze like a friendly neighbor.
meanings.sent4: The groundsel plant stood tall among the other flowers.
meanings.sent5: The groundsel plant's yellow blooms brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: A European plant with lobed leaves and yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The European groundsel was a beautiful addition to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lobed leaves of the groundsel plant caught the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The groundsel plant in Europe was the envy of all other plants.
meanings.sent4: The yellow flowers of the groundsel plant danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The European groundsel's leaves resembled tiny green hands waving hello.
